page.title: 11CUSTOMS AND TRADITIONS
page.content: The Hardwick Happening is a event which is on once a year there is lots to do like beat the goalie and a raffle and lots more.Before Hardwick Happening starts there is are floats which go round Hardwick in a line and they stop before the Hardwick Happening starts.This year it was on July 6th 1985.It has a lot of stalls like tombola and jewellery stalls.Each club does their own stall. The scouts sell hotdogs,coke and balloons.The youth club sprayed peoples hair and painted your face.There are tractor rides which cost 10p and there was a helicopter and the pilot talked about it.There was a big circle with bails around it so people like the army, majorettes and country dancers could perform. At the end of the Happenings the winners of the competitions were announced.
